name: Somniphobia (7 Deadly Sins Series)
description:
!!!WARNING!!! THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND HAS BEEN SPLIT INTO 3 CHAPTERS

Riley, Samira and Riles are having a party at Riley's house.

Once the party is over, they decide to spend the night at Riley's house because it was late.

However once they all fall asleep, they all find themselves stuck in a shared lucid nightmare in which each of them is pursued by a personification of their greatest phobia in a house that seems to be endless.

The only way for them to wake up from this nightmare will be to fight they’re fears, if they fail to do so they’ll be stuck there forever.

Will they be able to overcome their fears and wake up from this nightmare ?

Made with Godot 3.3
